channel.title: Pixel 3 on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Pixel 3 on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.description: Google: Here is somewhat of a premium phone (Pixel 3) for $800 Customers: Go Home, Google, you’re drunk. Google: Here is a plastic version of the same phone with less features and slower hardware (Pixel 3a) for $400 Customers: it’s the best Take my money! Google: Tricked ya!
item.content:
Google: Here is somewhat of a premium phone (Pixel 3) for $800

Customers: Go Home, Google, you’re drunk.

Google: Here is a plastic version of the same phone with less features and slower hardware (Pixel 3a) for $400

Customers: it’s the best Take my money!

Google: Tricked ya!
